version_description:
This is the official launch version!

Special thanks to the community! We collected the feedback and ideas that we have received from you and we developed a few really nice features thanks to you!

1.0.11
Thanks for the feedback!
- Citizens & vehicles will now give you cash, GOLD, and XP! It will pop up randomly so be quick and click!
- Repair frequency dramatically reduced!
- Gold costs will be 20% cheaper!
- Less dark during the

1.1.0
- Get regular free treasure chests
- Purchase valuable chests: bronze, silver or gold!

1.1.2
- New shopmenu
- New currency menu
- Smaller harbors (no overlapping issues with buildings behind it!)
- New upgrade labels
- XP boost & timeboost gifts in wooden chests
- Added support for 6 new languages (Polish, Indonesian,

Stability improvements
Support for extra languagues

1.2.3
- Stability improvements

1.2.0
- For all the people who are at level 60 ... we added 10 NEW LEVELS! (thank you for your patience)
- And of course a loads of new buildings!
- Plus some cool buildings to fill the space on Mosquito M

1.2.6
* Upgrades don't require ribbons to be cut
* Cutting the ribbons for new buildings made easier
* Stability improvements on lower end devices
* Bugfix (employees start to work faster, other minor stuff)
* Subscribe to our newsletters (

1.2.9
* Fixed some small issues on city advisor, boats, umbrellas and pedestrians.
* Improved stability: Memory usage reduced by using 720p GUI assets.

Yes community, we heard you! In this build:
* New island “Sandy Shore” !!
* Added 38 new decorations with 5 new buildings !!

Enjoy and keep your feedback coming! :-)
Added 10 new levels (and re-unlocks for existing buildings)

1.4.1
+ Bugfix

1.4.0
+ New island
+ 10 levels
+ 5 buildings
+ 38 decorations
+ Bugfixes
User is provided with feedback when device is full and game could not be saved.
Small bugfix

-Speedup popup opens without intermediate 1.5 menu when upgrading / constructing
-Fixed the pling sound
-All webpages (mostly facebook) are opened through OS, so that you are most likely logged in; never using an ingame webview
-Fixed bug with le
45 New Levels!
More XP Levels
Various improvements
Stability and performance improvements

Some visual improvements
Support for iPhone X

Extra buildings
Some visual improvements
Stability and performance improvements for certain devices
Lots of small improvements

Extra buildings
Some visual improvements

Improved User Controls
Small improvements & bugfixes

Improved User Controls
Small improvements
Made a few stability improvements.

Fixed bug which could crash the game when sending it to the background
Fixed faulty dpi detection on some devices

Your privacy is important to us! The game is now GDPR Compliant.
Brand new appicon, lots of small in game improvements, some new buildings and various tweaks. Enjoy this new update!
Please don't forget to rate our game, thank you very much!
Can you find the pirates chests near the coast? Find them and receive a nice gift :)

Fixed bug which could crash the game when sending it to the background
Fixed faulty dpi detection on some devices
Made a few stability improvements.
Made several stability improvements. The game should run a lot smoother than before.
We changed some things under the hood to make the game run smoother

* Finally we've reached v2.0.0!
* Redesigned the shop menu: it's much easier now to navigate to the building you're looking for
* Fix a bug where audio wasn't muted while it needed to be
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

A brand-new island has added to City Island 4
Expand now and grow your city even further!
